titles.title: Low-Revenue Recipient Paycheck Protection Program Relief Act of 2022
Low-Revenue Recipient Paycheck Protection Program Relief Act of 2022

A bill to permit certain businesses to select an alternative covered period for loan forgiveness under the Paycheck Protection Program and provide certain businesses additional loan forgiveness, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Small Business and Entrepreneurship.

bill.summary:
Low-Revenue Recipient Paycheck Protection Program Relief Act of 2022
This bill provides additional forgiveness and flexibilities to certain low-revenue recipients of Paycheck Protection Program loans.
